Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your interest in joining BSP {!Case.Country__c}.
Should you wish to participate through an IBCS, please note your airline will need to join one of the IBCS Consolidators currently availabe.
To provide you furher details on this process, please visit the below web page where you will find all the related and useful details:
http://www.iata.org/services/finance/bsp/Pages/ibcs.aspx
For future support in regards to any other query, please log a new inquiry through our customer portal at http://www.iata.org/customer-portal/Pages/contactus.aspx
We look forward to hearing from you shortly.
Thank you,
